website_summaries.verdict: An excellent pair of heavy-duty ice cleats that can keep you safe on even the slickest snow and ice and hold up well to many winters of use.
pros: Cleats have 18 stainless steel spikes with strengthening chains
Spikes and chains are corrosion-resistant to increase durability
Easy to put on and take off
Can fit over most footwear, including sneakers, boots, and dress shoes
cons: Ice and snow can get trapped between the spikes

customer_reviews.title: Coolest thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Love these cleats. I live in rural Utah and have to shovel lots of snow at work. Real danger is when new snow falls over existing ice. Since I've worn these cleats, no problem. Also take dumb dog on hikes over ice and frozen mud, no problem. I really cannot tell they are on except when walking in areas of no snow, make nice sound.. Never a slip on concrete or asphalt with or without snow. Also look cool on, impress fellow employees.
customer_reviews.author: henry hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These work well and have held up just fine. No directions and did come with a couple of velcro scraps I didn't know where they were suppose to go. Didn't use them. Don't need them. Also comes with a strange storage bag you can keep these in if you take them on and off. These fit tight on size 13 hiking boot and my intentions were to leave them on. Not sure I'd want to mess with putting this product on and off but the tighter they fit the better they work.
customer_reviews.author: Goodie

customer_reviews.title: A Good Solution
customer_reviews.text: These snow grips look like they will work well. They appear to be well built and rugged. Figuring out how to put them on boots was challenging but enough looking at pictures finally produced a solution. The only downside I find so far is they are heavy. Adding these to my pack will make a noticeable difference in the weight of my pack, which is already pretty heavy. This seems a small price to pay for safety on winter trails.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Spikes on time worked well on first hike.
customer_reviews.text: The LeanKing traction cleats arrived on time and work very well, so far. I used them on a 2 mile hike that included trail sections that were covered with ice. There was no snow, just ice and frozen ground. I wore the product on size 13 hiking boots with the extra straps that I believe make it less like for the spikes to fall off. While I was hiking I met someone with only one boot covered with spikes. He had lost the other one. He wasn't wearing the strap. I didn't ask who made the spikes he was wearing.
customer_reviews.author: william e fanning

customer_reviews.title: Best cleats ever!
customer_reviews.text: These cleats kick butt! I should have gotten these years ago instead of messing around with the crappy yaktrax brand. The first day I got them I deliberately walked on all the ice in my driveway and I never slipped once. The teeth on these badboys dig down into the ice and keep your footing solid. I feel so much safer now walking outside and don't ever have to worry about falling again. Them being stainless steel means no rust stains on the floor in the house when I take my boots off. I am happy with the one year warranty. Yaktrax only has a 90 day warranty, they rust, and they are of poor quality. Thank you Leanking!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Seem good for ice this winter
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband who often does winter logging and clearing and needs good grip for icy, slippery ground. They have really big picks or teeth (not sure what they’re called) and my husband is excited to try them this winter. I appreciate that they came with a thick carrying case for safe storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy in VT

customer_reviews.title: Life saver...literally
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so life saver may be a bit extreme but they definitely helped. I bought these last minute when realizing the 14'er I was climbing here in Colorado had some snow. There was more snow than expected and these handled it with ease. Gave me a ton of security knowing I wasn't going to slide off the mountain. highly suggest for moderate snow/ice hiking
customer_reviews.author: David Damron

customer_reviews.title: Jury is in ... don't buy them.
customer_reviews.text: Have used them twice now and they definitely work. The issue I am concerned with is that I've already had one of the links break that goes to the rubber part of the micro spikes. Bent it back in place but definitely worried about long term sturdiness. Update: Have now used 3 times and they are falling apart at the seams. Appears to be a design/quality issue and I would encourage consumers to look elsewhere. I was being patient and trying to give them the benefit of the doubt but my reward is that I can no longer return them. Save yourself the trouble and buy something that is better made
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ricci

customer_reviews.title: You will be invincible
customer_reviews.text: I used these cleats on a couple of steep hillsides covered with wet grass, a steep hillside covered with slippery pine needles, and a steep hillside covered with mud. I got the jobs done, and I did not slip or fall a single time! They fit perfectly and they are very easy on-and-off. The only thing I don't understand or like is the Velcro strap (which is essential for sideways travel) because it has to be twisted to fasten properly. Otherwise, the product is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gripping
customer_reviews.text: These grips are awesome!! Took my dog to the dog park today and it was an icey nightmare. Without these grips I wouldn't have been able to walk through the gate to the park. The park had inches and inches of snow that had packed down to ice and it had started melting so the ice was not only slippery but also wet which made it worse. They easily slid on over my boots and stayed on with no problems. I was able to go uphill and downhill with no worries. My dog even ran into the side of my leg but I never lost my footing. I would highly recommend these Grips!!
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: For the price great.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber stretches very well. They fit over my size 13 pack boots perfectly. The quality of the chain and cleats is not as good as the brand I use on hiking boots. I did not want to spend as much for cleats for my pack boots. For the price and limited use these are great.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: The Correct Cleats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use during my trip to Iceland when we had a tour to the Glacier. It is exactly what they have for the tourists to use with the helmet, which were included in the price I paid for the tour. I could not have used it and return. However, I just used it anyways. But this exact cleats were being used. It has a good grip to the very slippery ice.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Carter

customer_reviews.title: Helped us in Colorado snow fields.
customer_reviews.text: My 15-year-old son and I used these on several inclined snow fields and an avalanche area in Colorado and these worked great. They are easy to put on and off. They are sturdy stainless steel and hold well into late-spring hard snow.
customer_reviews.author: AncientOne

customer_reviews.title: Best snow cleats weve used.
customer_reviews.text: We love snow and ice hiking, however finding the right cleats has been a challenge. Happily, I can say the search is over. These are perfect. Tight, stable, effective, stylish. Overall super pleased. They performed great in Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: Kray

customer_reviews.title: Recommended gear!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got these to put on some snow/hiking shoes while walking the dog. The neighborhood gets quite icy and these help. The only down side is when walking on pavement/hard surfaces that don’t have snow or ice since the prongs are fairly long. Overall recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great add on cleats , well made, and stay on your boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made cleats!! My husband, was impressed by how aggressive they looked and felt for add on cleats!! They don't slip off, happy i bought them! I wear a women's size 6 (Winter boots 6.5 to 7 women’s) i went with size medium, perfect fit and they stay on , I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: T.M.B

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Winter Hiking
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic. I hiked Sleeping Beauty in the adirondacks before all the snow melted and the last 1/4 mile was slick ice. These were a life saver and I got to the summit just fine. Super sturdy, easy to put on and take off. I got one pair for myself (womens size 10) and my boyfriend (mens size 9) both in a large and they fit us perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works wonderfully on ice.
customer_reviews.text: I have a driveway that slopes down. I slid down it with the snowblower last year. This year no sliding and I can shovel without slipping and falling. I wish I had known of these sooner. They are easy to get over the boots and stay put once they are on. Worth every penny paid!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lucking

customer_reviews.title: Great spikes!
customer_reviews.text: These spikes performed well when I put them to the test. They stayed on my boots with no problem with easy-on, easy-off and provided great traction. No issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and take off and walking on snow and ice safely done. I bought a pair for my sister and myself after having many unsuccessful tries with products from other vendors. What motivated this purchase were the favorable reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Suzann L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cleats!!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little too aggressive to start with, but the more I wear them, the better I like them. They offer great traction in snow and ice. No more falling on my butt on the ice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ice Spikes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband because I had a similar pair and we had a ton of ice this year. These worked great and most importantly Stayed on! I'm going to be replacing mine with these as the cheaper type I have don't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: barn kittie

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on my size 12 boots
customer_reviews.text: These are not too fancy but do the job well on ice and snow. It's a little hard to stretch them on but once on stay put. I recommend them for anyone who walks on ice without slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lorensd1

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I live in the PNW where a lot of hikes go above 4000 feet. These are wonderful. They are the same quality as my friend's who paid $90 for hers! I didnt slip and slide, and they are super easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: JoLynn

customer_reviews.title: ICE Cleats work well to help prevent slipping and falling
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these a couple of times, but these cleats work well. They fit and don't move around after they are put on. They are easy to put on over my hiking shoes. Great traction on ice and snow. They seem to be well made and should hold up but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: PinionStone

customer_reviews.title: Virtually the same as more expensive options
customer_reviews.text: Compared these to my buddy's $70 micro spikes, and they were virtually the same. The gauge of the chain links appear to be slightly thinner, but used them on a hike that was partial snow and partial rock and they were not damaged by the rock at all.
customer_reviews.author: HeBeGB

customer_reviews.title: Secure footing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to place on footwear and stayed securely in place while removing snow/ice from the driveway. This is the first time I have purchased this type of grips/cleats and am very pleased with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: C Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Great microspikes
customer_reviews.text: We bought two pairs for my wife and I, and they very useful in climbing Mt. San Jacinto in Palm Springs, CA. They were easy to put on over our hiking boots, and held up very well in snow, ice and mud. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: We've had a couple ice storms and then snow on top of the ice...and a salt shortage. I almost wiped out three times walking to the mailbox to retrieve this item. I have not slipped once since using these. I wasn't sure what to expect but it's like there ISN'T a solid sheet of ice under me when walking or shoveling. No slip whatsoever. I truly love these.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: These really work.
customer_reviews.text: I live where the snow is waist deep or chest deep in most places this winter and there is an underlying layer of ice or densely packed snow. I have a very large snowblower, which is heavy, and I tended to slip on the ice or packed snow, while turning it or pulling it back. Not any more. These spikes have really helped. No slipping at all the last time I blew the snow!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Shanlu best ever
customer_reviews.text: I got these spikes a couple weeks ago and used them today Nov 19 2018 on the Tuckerman Trail Mt Washington. I must say they worked absolutely fantastic and would buy them again. I will definitely recommend them to anyone looking for good trail traction at a reasonable cost
customer_reviews.author: KGW

customer_reviews.title: Well made, seller quick to help out with anything.
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be well made. People complain about the carrying case but I think it'll work just fine for storage purposes. I will most likely leave this set in my truck for winter purposes and might get a 2nd set for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet but they appear to be sturdy. They are smaller than the American shoe size. 03/04/19 update- I used them today and they work well and are easy to walk on.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Incem
customer_reviews.text: Just got today, came 4 days sooner than expected. XL will just fit size 13 in a Rocky insulated boot. They seem well made. Crazy traction. DO NOT WEAR IN THE HOUSE. You will destroy the floor. Lol
customer_reviews.author: ColonelAngus

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one peak
customer_reviews.text: Product broke under pressure after one hike, I bought these to get through snow and ice as they're intended to do but they did not last me on the mountain. I ended up having to bail off the mountain due to safety concerns after i no longer had traction when these broke. Very disappointed since I drove so very far to spend three days up in the mountains and only got a day out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: They look heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These groups arrived quickly and went on easily. I don't think I will need the carrying case because I intend to leave them on the same boots. I have not tried them yet, but it is hoped they work better than a different brand I had that completely fell apart while I was wearing them the first time and I fell and broke my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous ice cleats.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted cleats that go over my winter hikers. These fit that need. They are perfect. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: CB in Nh

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have very steep rocky hills to weed whack. Tryed football and baseball cleats and neither worked. Continued to slip and slide. These did the trick! And they fit over my work boots perfectly! Take a size 9, bought size to fit. If you have unsure footing on hillside, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 21

customer_reviews.title: Great on Ice and Snow.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I walk my dog in Wisconsin weather conditions and these snow grips saved me this winter. I bought them after falling three times on ice. They are easy to put on your boots and they make it easy to walk on snow and ice. I felt much more confident walking my dog after getting these. They are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: They work as well as a more expensive brand that I bought for my wife
customer_reviews.author: MRJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: These are worth every penny. I live in Maine where we get lots of snow and ice. My walk consists of a few steep hills. No problem getting over them with these. I'll be ordering 2 more sets
customer_reviews.author: Sean Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a month
customer_reviews.text: The durability of these is suspect. They only lasted me about a month
customer_reviews.author: KGJ

customer_reviews.title: Ice? Steep  incline? No worries
customer_reviews.text: These work really well, very sturdy and seem well made. I've used them at least 10 times and they seem great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't slip with these.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me from falling but a little too bulky--safe none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now walk on ice with impunity!
customer_reviews.text: Quite sharp and effective in hard ice. Not good for dancing or bowling!
customer_reviews.author: spendtoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Solid footing on ice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach to your boots and remove as needed. Works great on snow and ice. Just what I needed for walking on ice covered sidewalks and streets.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Great ice grips!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a cheaper pair of ice grips for my husband. They came off his boots and the tacks came out of the rubber after 3 uses. Your ice/snow grips are fantastic! They don't come off his boots and no spikes coming off! Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: CC LeRay

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: A must have when walking on icy surfaces and hard snow. I use over my works boots.
customer_reviews.author: jessie lakeview

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The micro spikes were great and provided much needed traction hiking through ice and snow. Unfortunately, they caught a snag and broke. However, the seller was quick to replace them! No questions asked and great customer service. I’m glad I went with these and am excited to use them again
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good rugged product
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for walking this winter,we live on a dirt road and it's very icy he says they work great
customer_reviews.author: R. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Safer with these on you boots.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the cleats. Have not used them yet but did put them on my boots. Looks like they will be fine. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: two B's

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product at a fair price. Using these in Norway.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Crampons!
customer_reviews.text: I never even knew what a 'crampon' was until I moved to the cold upper Midwest. All it took was slipping and falling on ice, TWICE. Let me just say that these things work great. They never slip off. And they have this whole "Mad Max" look that you just can't beat. I recommend them without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Very good traction and easy to fit on your boots. No caking up with ice like another model I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mikie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am sure there are more expensive options which provide a better solution but for the money these worked very well. Easy on and off as well as solid grip. Used on snow covered trails at Grand canyon. Storage bag is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good traction
customer_reviews.text: Work great walking on ice. They are very sharp so you can’t leave them on to drive
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C Ray

customer_reviews.title: Kept coming off
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 and these kept coming off in our muddy rainy hike up Stair way to Heaven
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Watts

customer_reviews.title: You can walk or run with that!
customer_reviews.text: This help me lot quickly to escape from Mount LeConte in great smoky mountain midnight when earthquake hit we had put this ice cleat on and walk fast we can reach to our car at night very icy and left great smoky mountain we just want be safe away from mountain in case there’s more earthquake hit.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality spikes
customer_reviews.text: This Product was awful because one of the spikes broke just after a few hours my little son was wearing them on nice soft snow while doing snow tubbing, not even hiking on icy rocks! The spikes were not even too tight on his rain boots at all so I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Very secure walking on ice.
customer_reviews.text: I have to walk my dog no matter what the weather is. With these I never worry about slipping on the ice. This year in Michigan we had two polar vortexes. No problem. I need some for my dog - she fell a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit well over larger hiking boots. Keep a tight grip and provide good traction for ice and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use ice cleats
customer_reviews.text: I live in Vermont and this year we have had a lot of Ice (boilerplate). Before I got these cleats I used an old opair of boots w/sheetmetal screws screwed into the soles. These are easier to put on and more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the snow!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for all the snow we got in Minnesota this year!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a whim in case there was still snow on Mt Baden-Powell in June. Surprise, there was. The sizing was accurate and the spikes worked as advertised. Ended up really relieved to have had them and had far better traction than my friend who just had his hiking boots
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits my size 13 snow boots perfect. Shipped and arrived as promised. Living in Alaska, the Leanking ice grips will be used all year long on the glaciers.
customer_reviews.author: T. In Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Loved my Cleats!
customer_reviews.text: Hiked Mt. Bierstadt today, a 14er in Colorado. Very icey and slick on the top. I would not have made it without my Leanking snow grips! Very easy to put on and keep me from falling off the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly on my boots.
customer_reviews.text: Work real well on the ice, & weren't loose & moving around.
customer_reviews.author: duane monville

customer_reviews.title: Order size up
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 shoe and hiking boot, so I ordered a medium. They were too small so I returned to order the large. Other than that, seemed to be good quality, though at the time of this review I have not yet used them.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They work great on frozen lakes and stay on my boots
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: Greak spikes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spikes!! I am able to hike up sheer ice trails this winter with these, no problem. I don't even need the velcro straps. I would highly recommend them! :D
customer_reviews.author: Lovestohike

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. They fell apart pretty fast
customer_reviews.author: mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need for hiking in snowy and icy trails
customer_reviews.text: I love these cleats. I recently used them in a day hike over a mountain trail with snow and ice. The cleats bit into the ice firmly as advertised. I definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wu

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: These broke 2 days after the return window closed. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kailey s.

customer_reviews.title: They fit great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is outside a lot for his job. These are the perfect Valentines Day gift for him. They fit his military boots perfectly and look very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Mega traction
customer_reviews.text: They fit my boots well and I don’t think I’ll have any trouble getting traction on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: The running man

customer_reviews.title: Great value & quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great for snow/ice hiking, they do exactly what they are designed for & durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Great on thick ice and for ice fishing!
customer_reviews.text: Work great! Little hard to put on! But a great product on the overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: These are very reliable, i was walking on thick ice wearing these like i was walking on a summer sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: bbp

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Velcro strap easy to loose and not real quick to put on. But crampons stay centered on foot so long as not too aggressive downhill or sidehill conditions.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for very walking on ice, the cleats grabs fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put on and work well walking on ice.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: I really like these cleats, looking forward to using them.
customer_reviews.text: Soft rubber, thick chains, a nice little carry bag. I will buy these again and recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Truman  Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Fits big boots
customer_reviews.text: They fit my husbands size 14 Irish setters, no easy featp!
customer_reviews.author: amy r chase

product_meta.title: Leanking Ice Snow Grips, Traction Cleats Ice Cleats with 18 Spikes for Walking, Jogging, Climbing and Hiking on Snow, Ice, Mud, Sand and Wet Grass
product_meta.description:
Traction Cleats with stainless steel Spikes ,Especially Suitable for Walking, Jogging, Climbing and Hiking on Snow, Ice, Mud, Sand and Wet Grass. 

Why choose our traction cleats?
Thicken TPE band ,Tolerant to -45°C /-49℉,Fit most footwear. 
With heavy duty stainless steel teeth and Strengthening Chains. 
Secure and adjustable Velcro straps, keeps the cleats solidly attached to boot. 
Reinforced Joint, safer and more stable. The chain system can provide excellent traction on a variety of icy surfaces. 
Double reinforced rubber eyelets that allow the elastomer bands to be lighter and stronger than ever and to prevent tearing and improve longevity. 

Package included: 
1 * Pair of Crampons(shoes NOT included) 
1 * Pair of Velcro Straps
1 * Carry Bag

Note: 
1. Traction Cleats ONLY, shoes displayed in pictures are NOT included. 
2. This is an outdoor mountaineering auxiliary tools, please do not use it as a professional rock climbing tool or other tools. 
3. For oversized shoes or boots, we recommend purchasing one size larger than your normal shoe size. 
4.After each use, please keep clean and dry before store it .
feature_bullets: Ice Snow Grips Adopt TPE band:Thicken TPE band ,Tolerant to -45°C /-49℉,which is of flexibility, anti-abrasion as well as anti-tearing and could improve longevity for a quick and secure fit on a variety of footwear.

Traction Cleats has 18 Stainless Steel Teeth:18 heavy duty stainless steel teeth and strengthening chains,with long-lasting soles that bite into the slickest ice and snow.The spikes are made from heat-treated stainless steel for excellent durability and corrosion resistance.

Balance Enhanced and Reinforced Joint:18 spikes per foot, with 12 spikes at the forefoot and 6 spikes at the heel. Each wide heel plate with 3 spikes is for secure downhill traction and each spike is about 0.55 inch .

Flexible and Pocket Size:Flexible, Easy to put on and take off with secure and adjustable straps.The snow grips suitable for different shoe size and fit most foot wear: sneakers, boots, casual and dress shoes. Portable, light weight, can put it in a small storage bag.

Traction Cleats with Full Money Back Guarantee: We offer 1 year warranty and full money back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with this product or if you have any question, please feel free to contact us. We would like to issue full refund if finally we could not resolve your problem or you are not satisfied with the result.
